title: DayZ_0.42.116.002_patch02_full_Kortal.zip
description:
DayZ 0.42.116.002 patch 02 full
Patch for initial release of 0.42.116.002 http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9728812/DayZ_StandAlone_0.42.116.002) to patch 02

replace all files by theses new ones. don't forget to replace client.bin too !

welcome to 0.42.116.212 (actually named 0.43.116.212 on experimental ;)

run game with stream2wrapperLauncher.exe

+ Correction ironsight M4 and AK74 (this time it's true! )
+ Possibility to catch some rain water if you have a bottle or flask ( only works when it rains )
+ Add to loot items : Radio, walkie-talkie, ( remember to keep 9V batteries ;)) watch, glasses Joey pitchwork , sickle , new shirts with pockets , tents ( once deployed , the tent disappears the next reboot with what it contains ) , fishing preserves , canned bacon, tomato, pepper , potato , apple, Crossbow , rack and bolt
+ Add spawn points cars. They appear randomly on 20 different points (50 % chance to spawn per spot ) , always a bit less crowded areas , other spawn points ahead
+ Attention: the crossbow , do not eject the "rack" ( I called the charger as AC). If you Eject it disappear. To reload , you must drag -drop in your inventory, then drag the bolts in, then slide back to the crossbow
Sewing kit + the password status in the clothes " worn " rather than " pristine " . You can not repair clothes " ruined "
+ Add timer to 5 sec connection (do not exit the game during those 5 seconds or you will respawn on a new character !)
+ Error correcting UI p3d ak74 !
+ Error correcting UI textures ruger green & black
+ Fixed some bugs ds database (including loot the long ranks scope and AK74M )
+ The body of a dead player disconnects disappears after 30 seconds (in test)

+ correction ironsight M4 et AK74 (cette fois, c'est vrai !)
